body.p: The documentation project has news to share, reports this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The release engineering team did a critical appraisal of the 2005.0 release and started planning the roadmap for the next one. A new LiveDVD from the PPC lead full of interesting features has been made available via bittorrent, and more news from the community and press clippings are waiting for readers. Tips and tricks answers once and for all how the Gentoo LiveCD bootsplash magic is being done, and bug statistics, security announcements and developer news are closing this week's GWN. Hope you like it!
